title: Polyimide-based porous carbon and cobalt nanoparticle composites as high-performance electromagnetic wave absorbers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9716-9724
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00488D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wentao Yu, Jiahui Lin, Zhaozhang Zhao, Jiyong Fang, Ziqing Wang, Jintao Huang, Yonggang Min
This study successfully utilized a straightforward approach, choosing liquid–liquid phase separation to build a porous structure and synthesize composite absorbers based on polyimide-based porous carbon and cobalt nanoparticles (designated as PPC/Co-700 and PPC/Co-800).
